lyric:
[00:11.33]It's been a long time that I've been on my own, and I can't take no more
[00:21.13]But these winds are changin'
[00:23.66]They'll blow me through the storm until I see the shore
[00:30.50]And I'm prayin' for someone to show me I'm not done
[00:36.15]Sometimes I see your face
[00:40.17]You've got everything I need
[00:45.04]When I'm lost, it's only you I seek
[00:50.21]You've got wings to set me free
[00:55.30]When I doubt, you're makin' me believe
[01:00.27]That angels can fall, angels can fall
[01:09.97]And I'll cross the ocean
[01:12.43]I'll walk the desert sand
[01:14.84]I'll find those hills to climb
[01:19.88]And I'll keep on searchin' 'cause I know you want to land
[01:25.03]Into these arms of mine
[01:29.25]On this road that I'm walkin', I hear you talkin'
[01:34.89]I know I'll find you soon
[01:38.85]You've got everything I need
[01:43.84]When I'm lost, it's only you I seek
[01:48.96]You've got wings to set me free
[01:53.98]When I doubt, you're makin' me believe
[01:58.99]That angels can fall, angels can fall
[02:08.40]I've been hurt and I've been left on the floor
[02:18.42]You're the light that lifts me up through that open door
[02:29.92]You've got everything I need
[02:34.82]When I'm lost, it's only you I seek
[02:39.96]You've got wings to set me free
[02:45.08]When I doubt, you're makin' me believe
[02:50.07]That angels can fall, angels can fall
tlyric:
[00:11.33]我一个人已经很久了，我不能这么下去了
[00:21.13]但是这些风在改变
[00:23.66]它将我吹过风暴直到我看到支柱
[00:30.50]我祈祷某人出现告诉我别放弃
[00:36.15]有时候我看到你的脸
[00:40.17]你有我想要的一切
[00:45.04]当我迷失的时候，我只想找到你
[00:50.21]你有让我自由的翅膀
[00:55.30]当我疑惑的时候，你使我信服
[01:00.27]天使会坠落，天使会坠落
[01:09.97]我将穿过海洋
[01:12.43]我将走过沙漠
[01:14.84]我将找到攀爬的山峰
[01:19.88]我会一直寻找因为我知道你想
[01:25.03]投入我的怀抱
[01:29.25]在我走着的路上，我听到你讲话
[01:34.89]我知道我很快就会找到你
[01:38.85]你有我想要的一切
[01:43.84]当我迷失的时候，我只想找到你
[01:48.96]你有让我自由的翅膀
[01:53.98]当我疑惑的时候，你使我信服
[01:58.99]天使会坠落，天使会坠落
[02:08.40]我被伤害了 被抛弃在地上
[02:18.42]你是鼓舞我站起来的那盏灯
[02:29.92]你有我想要的一切
[02:34.82]当我迷失的时候，我只想找到你
[02:39.96]你有让我自由的翅膀
[02:45.08]当我疑惑的时候，你使我信服
[02:50.07]天使会坠落，天使会坠落
